comment1: Example of how to add new variants to the pool
comment2: Name represents variant name (yay), weight defines frequency of spawning (spawn chance = variant weight/total weight for spot). Both fields are mandatory
comment3: allowed_biomes acts as whitelist. All biomes defined by either tag or biome id will be defined as only valid places to spawn. Optional
comment4: to add biomes by tag just do "tag": [namespace:biome_tag, namespace:another_biome_tag]
comment5: to add biomes by biome id do "biome": [namespace:biome, namespace:another_biome]
comment6: To prevent variant from spawning in certain biomes do the same, but under banned_biomes instead allowed_biomes. Optional
comment7: altitude represents Y coordinate range on which variant can spawn. By default it's from -1000 to 1000. Optional
comment8: min declares minimum Y, max declares maximum Y
comment9: Comments do nothing btw, you can yeet them
